definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ps 65:14 pasture (√ dub.; Thes der. fr. [[כַּר]] lamb (=lamb-pasturage); Schwally:ZAW x. (1890) 186 fr. [[כרה]], and comp. As. kirû [which however = nursery of trees, grove Dl:HWB 353], Ar. kur=un cistern; Hom:NS 100 from [[כרר]] q.v., orig. = round enclosure);—sg. only [[כַּד נִדְחָָבּ]] Is 30:23 a roomy pasture; pl. [[כָּרִים]] Ps 37:20, [[הַצּאׂן לָֽבְשׁוּ]] ´[[כ]] Ps 65:13 the pastures are clothed with the sheep (> Schwally:1. c. who tr. lambs Ps 37:20 after Aq SyrVer Targum and Ps 65:13, and underst. Is 30:23 of a def. pl.). —
